https://www.bertelsmann.com/news-and-med.title: BMG Celebrates Marc Bolan And T. Rex In New ...
https://www.bertelsmann.com/news-and-med.text: 20 May 2022 — BMG has announced “Angelheaded Hipster,” a new documentary about the British singer-songwriter Marc Bolan and his band T. Rex.
